column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////When we arrived I stepped up to the hostess stand where three employees were standing and talking amongst themselves and there was a very awkward moment where they stopped talking and turned to me silently until one them finally and very flatly asked "can I help you?" I won't take Â time explaining how the exchange went but it wasn't good by any means. But I think the overly loud music and very dim lighting may have contributed to the uneasy exchange
column2: because the entire time we were there the only way to communicate was to low-yell everything you had to say or lean in very close so you can hear. Once seated we were given free water that was SO Houston... very bleachy.
